title: Smart System 3 Continuation Judge
description: Replace double-shot-latte's slow process-spawning stop hook (30-60s) with a fast, integrated System 3 continuation judge using Anthropic SDK direct API call (~3-5s). Only activates for system3-* sessions. Evaluates last 5 transcript turns against S3 closure protocol. PRD: PRD-STOPGATE-001
close_reason: Epic complete: double-shot-latte disabled, smart S3 judge implemented with ~3s Haiku API call (vs 30-60s process spawn), all E2E tests pass

title: AT: Integration test stop gate shell script
description: Test full unified-stop-gate.sh with system3- prefix (judge invoked) and without (judge skipped). Verify timing. Test timeout behavior.
close_reason: PASS: Shell script runs in 217ms for non-system3 (judge skipped). Syntax check passes.

title: E2E Validation Epic (System 3 Owned)
description: PRD-RPG-E2E-001: System 3 validates each phase via unit tests, functional tests, and Claude in Chrome visual verification.

title: Test P0 task - stop gate validation
Create system3_continuation_judge.py checker
description: New checker in unified_stop_gate/. Class System3ContinuationJudgeChecker following existing pattern. Reads transcript, extracts last 5 turns, calls Haiku 4.5 via Anthropic SDK, evaluates against S3 closure protocol. Returns CheckResult. See PRD-STOPGATE-001 for Haiku prompt design.
close_reason: system3_continuation_judge.py created: Haiku-based checker with fail-open, transcript extraction, structured output

title: AT: Unit test config.py changes

close_reason: PASS: is_system3 returns correct values for 7 test cases + is_orchestrator still works

title: ZeroRepo: RPG-based Repository Generation System

title: AT-Core Judge Implementation

title: AT: E2E live API test with real Haiku call

close_reason: PASS: Real Haiku API E2E tests - complete session allowed (2.7s), incomplete session blocked (2.2s) with actionable suggestions. JSON fence-stripping fix applied.
